overview: VH-1 documentary from the 'Egos and Icons' series, broadcast in 1993 and featuring interviews  from 1980-1993 as well as some live clips from:  Glasgow Hampden Park 27-May-1993  Montreal 17-Sep-1988  Unknown location / date (sorry!)  Amnesty International Tour
tagline: Peter Gabriel is the focus of this TV Special aired on VH1 in 1993.
title: US and Then
